mapper.select: SELECT COM_NO AS "NUMBER", COM_DATE "DATE" , PI_NAME AS "NAME" , PI_NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME" ,COM_CONTENT "comContent" ,MEMCODE AS"memCode" FROM PROJECT_INFO PI JOIN COMMENTS C ON PI.CODE = c.com_op_code JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON mi.mem_code= c.com_mem_code WHERE PI.CODE = #{code} order by 2 desc

SELECT REC_NO AS "RENUMBER" , REC_COM_NO AS"NUMBER" ,REC_CONTENT AS"comContent" , PI_NAME AS"NAME" ,PI_NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME" ,REC_DATE AS "DATE" FROM RECOMENT RE JOIN COMMENTS C ON RE.REC_COM_NO = C.COM_NO JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON mi.mem_code= RE.REC_mem_code WHERE REC_COM_NO =#{number} order by 6 desc
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM PROJECT_INFO PI JOIN COMMENTS C ON PI.CODE = C.COM_OP_CODE JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON MI.MEM_CODE= c.COM_MEM_CODE WHERE PI.CODE = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS(COM_NO, COM_CONTENT, COM_DATE, COM_OP_CODE, COM_MEM_CODE) VALUES(COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{comContent}, SYSDATE, #{code}, #{memCode})
INSERT INTO RECOMENT(REC_NO, REC_CONTENT, REC_DATE, REC_COM_NO, REC_MEM_CODE) VALUES(RECOMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{comContent}, SYSDATE, #{number}, #{memCode})
